channel.title: Max Player Checking
channel.description:
Hello My Babes
I was wondering if there is a command or wat evs to test the max amount of players my server can handle? Ive seen on multiple dev threads and wanted to test out my source i coded. Thanks pals
Nickypie

item.title: Max Player Checking
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:4, topic:470068”]Also, what you’re seeing is Bots. You might need to tweak it, but you can use the blitz bot

http://www.allgofree.org/blitzbot/[/quote]

yes thats what i was thinking of. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Max Player Checking
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Also, what you’re seeing is Bots. You might need to tweak it, but you can use the blitz bot

http://www.allgofree.org/blitzbot/

Read full topic

item.title: Max Player Checking
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“b b0yz 4, post:2, topic:470068”]I doubt there would be a command if you didn’t code it into your source yourself…especially if you wrote the source…

The max amount of players you can handle depends on your computer hardware, and your internet connection, if your server is a piece of shit or not, so google around and I am sure you will be able to find something.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Max Player Checking
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

I doubt there would be a command if you didn’t code it into your source yourself…especially if you wrote the source…

The max amount of players you can handle depends on your computer hardware, and your internet connection, so google around and I am sure you will be able to find something.
